mapper.select:
select a.id as id, a.target as target, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.update_user_id as updateUserId, i.user_name as updater from apicenter.ac_api_project a left join managercenter.mc_user_info i on i.id = a.update_user_id
a.aflag = 1
and a.target = #{target , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by a.id asc

select a.id as id, a.target as target, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.update_user_id as updateUserId, i.user_name as updater from apicenter.ac_api_project a left join managercenter.mc_user_info i on i.id = a.update_user_id where a.aflag = 1 order by a.id asc
mapper.insert:
insert into apicenter.ac_api_project
id,
target,
aflag,
create_time,
create_user_id,
update_time,
update_user_id,

mapper.update:
update apicenter.ac_api_project
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aflag = #{aflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
